PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and LUMO levels of PQCDTB were -5.24 eV and -3.32 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecule Orbital): This refers to the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) level of the molecule, which is -5.24 eV in this case.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital): This refers to the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) level of the molecule, which is -3.32 eV in this case.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecule Orbital): This refers to the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) level of the molecule, which is a material property that describes the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbitals in a molecule.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital): This refers to the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) level of the molecule, which is also a material property that describes the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbitals in a molecule.

So, the two entities that refer to material properties in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO
2. LUMO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
